name: I Am Ugg
description:
You are Ugg. Ugg is a caveman. Ugg does not understand many things, but he wishes to. In order to understand something, one must defeat it. This is your quest. It starts now.

Jump, dash, roll, climb, and fight your way across the great snowy mountain. You must understand.

You are Ugg. You will defeat them. You will defeat them all.

Note: The game CAN be played with the keyboard, but is most easily played with a gamepad. (06/21/16: A new default keyboard control scheme as well as customizable keyboard controls will be released in the next update!)

Controls (Keyboard)

Run - Space (HOLD)
Walk/Climb - WASD
Attack - J
Jump - K
Roll - L
Escape - Close Game

Controls (GamePad)

Run - L2/LT Button (HOLD)
Walk/Climb - D-Pad or Left Stick
Attack - X Button
Jump - A Button
Roll - R2/RT Button
Select - Close Game

Originally created for #shadowjam1, I Am Ugg was developed in roughly 3 weeks time. It has had a few updates since then and is a game that I plan to continue to update and tweak. If there is enough interest and support for the game, I may do a full-release paid version.
